title: The Go-Away Bird and Other Stories
description: Contents:- The Black Madonna- The Pawnbroker's Wife- The Twins- Miss Pinkerton's Apocalypse- 'A Sad Tale's Best for Winter'- The Go-Away Bird / Daisy Overend- You Should Have Seen the Mess- Come Along, Marjorie- The Seraph and the Zambesi- The Portobello Road
author: Muriel Spark
